title: Lexington foundation gets grant from Susan G. Komen
title_page: Lexington foundation gets grant from Susan G. Komen
maintext:
LEXINGTON — Lexington Community Foundation will receive $79,627 from Susan G. Komen Great Plains to partner with Lexington Regional Health Center for breast health education and breast cancer screenings in Dawson County, specifically to at-risk populations.
It is among seven community programs in Nebraska and South Dakota that will receive funds to assist medically underserved women and men. Programs were selected through a competitive application and independent review process.
